name: Mirror Darknut (Autoghost)
author: Mero
info: I decided to give Darknuts the mirror shield. This is the horrifying result. O_O
description: These guys will reflect magic and sword beams both from the player and enemies. This makes for interesting puzzles involving mirrorrobes as the demo shows.
setup: Create a darknut.Misc Attribute 11: GH_INVISIBLE_COMBO.Misc Attribute 12: MirrorDarknut Script Slot.Voila, you just created a wolf in sheep's clothing.
